channel.title: Break?

item.title: Break?
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Okay…Got the ‘up’ stairs fixed…All but one, but the ‘down’ stairs still glitch horribly, sending me in the completely wrong hight level…

case 4415://castle wars stairs downnnn if (objectX == 2380 && objectY == 3127) { teleportToX = 2380; teleportToY = 3130; heightLevel -= 1; } if (objectX == 2369 && objectY == 3126 && absX == 2369 && absY == 3127) { teleportToX = 2372; teleportToY = 3126; heightLevel -= 1; } if (objectX == 2374 && objectY == 3133) { teleportToX = 2374; teleportToY = 3130; heightLevel -= 1; } if (objectX== 2419 && objectY== 3080 && absX == 2419 && absY == 3080) { teleportToX = 2419; teleportToY = 3077; heightLevel -= 1; } if (objectX== 2430 && objectY== 3081 && absX == 2430 && absY == 3080) { teleportToX = 2427; teleportToY = 3081; heightLevel -= 1; } if (objectX== 2419 && objectY== 3080 && absX == 2420 && absY == 3080) { teleportToX = 2419; teleportToY = 3077; heightLevel -= 1; } if (objectX== 2425 && objectY== 3074 && absX == 2426 && absY == 3074) { teleportToX = 2425; teleportToY = 3077; heightLevel -= 1; } if (objectX == 2425 && objectY == 3074 && absX == 2426 && absY == 3074) { teleportToX = 2425; teleportToY = 3077; heightLevel -= 1; } if (objectX == 2430 && objectY == 3081 && absX == 2430 && absY == 3080) { teleportToX = 2427; teleportToY = 3081; heightLevel -= 1; } if (objectX == 2419 && objectY == 3080 && absX == 2420 && absY == 3080) { teleportToX = 2419; teleportToY = 3077; heightLevel -= 1; } break;

Kinda figured…Ya know…Since “heightLevel += 1” made me go up…“heighLevel -= 1” would make me go down…But no. Apparently not…Help? x.x

Read full topic

item.title: Break?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Put a ‘break;’ at the end of each case.

Read full topic

item.title: Break?

@Setsuna wrote:

Ugh, failing stairs. =\

item.title: Break?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[CODE]case 4417://castle wars stairs up
if (objectY == 3078 && objectX == 2419) { //stairs
if (absX == 2419 && absY == 3077) { //lower level
teleportToX = 2420;
teleportToY = 3080;

	}
}

if (objectX == 2428 && objectY == 3081) { //stairs
    if (absX == 2427 && absY == 3081) { //lower level
  teleportToX = 2430;
  teleportToY = 3080;
  heightLevel += 1;
	}
}


if (objectX == 2425 && objectY == 3074) { //stairs
    if (absX == 2425 && absY == 3077) { //lower level
  teleportToX = 2426;
  teleportToY = 3074;
  heightLevel += 1;
	}
}


case 4415://castle wars stairs downnnn
if (objectX == 2380 && objectY == 3127)
{
	teleportToX = 2380;
	teleportToY = 3130;
	heightLevel -= 1;
}
if (objectX == 2369 && objectY == 3126 && absX == 2369 && absY == 3127)
{
	teleportToX = 2372;
	teleportToY = 3126;
	heightLevel -= 1;
}
if (objectX == 2374 && objectY == 3133)
{
	teleportToX = 2374;
	teleportToY = 3130;
	heightLevel -= 1;
}
if (objectX== 2419 && objectY== 3080 && absX == 2419 && absY == 3080)
{
	teleportToX = 2419;
	teleportToY = 3077;
	heightLevel -= 1;
}
if (objectX== 2430 && objectY== 3081 && absX == 2430 && absY == 3080)
{
	teleportToX = 2427;
	teleportToY = 3081;
	heightLevel -= 1;
}
if (objectX== 2419 && objectY== 3080 && absX == 2420 && absY == 3080)
{
	teleportToX = 2419;
	teleportToY = 3077;
	heightLevel -= 1;
}
if (objectX== 2425 && objectY== 3074 && absX == 2426 && absY == 3074)
{
	teleportToX = 2425;
	teleportToY = 3077;
	heightLevel -= 1;
}
if (objectX == 2425 && objectY == 3074 && absX == 2426 && absY == 3074) 
{
  	teleportToX = 2425;
 	 teleportToY = 3077;
 	 heightLevel -= 1;	
}
if (objectX == 2430 && objectY == 3081 && absX == 2430 && absY == 3080) 
{
 	 teleportToX = 2427;
 	 teleportToY = 3081;
 	 heightLevel -= 1;	
}
if (objectX == 2419 && objectY == 3080 && absX == 2420 && absY == 3080) 
{
 	 teleportToX = 2419;
 	 teleportToY = 3077;
 	 heightLevel -= 1;	
}

break;
[/CODE]

Good luck.

item.title: Break?
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Where would I put the break in this, exactly? I’m trying to get all of my cw stairs to work…But when I added the “down” stairs the “up” stairs stopped working…So…

[code]case 4417://castle wars stairs up
if (objectY == 3078 && objectX == 2419) { //stairs
if (absX == 2419 && absY == 3077) { //lower level
teleportToX = 2420;
teleportToY = 3080;

	}
}

if (objectX == 2428 && objectY == 3081) { //stairs
    if (absX == 2427 && absY == 3081) { //lower level
  teleportToX = 2430;
  teleportToY = 3080;
  heightLevel += 1;
	}
}


if (objectX == 2425 && objectY == 3074) { //stairs
    if (absX == 2425 && absY == 3077) { //lower level
  teleportToX = 2426;
  teleportToY = 3074;
  heightLevel += 1;
	}
}[/code]

Here’s the whole cw code…:

[code]case 4417://castle wars stairs up
if (objectY == 3078 && objectX == 2419) { //stairs
if (absX == 2419 && absY == 3077) { //lower level
teleportToX = 2420;
teleportToY = 3080;

	}
}

if (objectX == 2428 && objectY == 3081) { //stairs
    if (absX == 2427 && absY == 3081) { //lower level
  teleportToX = 2430;
  teleportToY = 3080;
  heightLevel += 1;
	}
}


if (objectX == 2425 && objectY == 3074) { //stairs
    if (absX == 2425 && absY == 3077) { //lower level
  teleportToX = 2426;
  teleportToY = 3074;
  heightLevel += 1;
	}
}


case 4415://castle wars stairs downnnn
if (objectX == 2380 && objectY == 3127)
{
	teleportToX = 2380;
	teleportToY = 3130;
	heightLevel -= 1;
}
if (objectX == 2369 && objectY == 3126 && absX == 2369 && absY == 3127)
{
	teleportToX = 2372;
	teleportToY = 3126;
	heightLevel -= 1;
}
if (objectX == 2374 && objectY == 3133)
{
	teleportToX = 2374;
	teleportToY = 3130;
	heightLevel -= 1;
}
if (objectX== 2419 && objectY== 3080 && absX == 2419 && absY == 3080)
{
	teleportToX = 2419;
	teleportToY = 3077;
	heightLevel -= 1;
}
if (objectX== 2430 && objectY== 3081 && absX == 2430 && absY == 3080)
{
	teleportToX = 2427;
	teleportToY = 3081;
	heightLevel -= 1;
}
if (objectX== 2419 && objectY== 3080 && absX == 2420 && absY == 3080)
{
	teleportToX = 2419;
	teleportToY = 3077;
	heightLevel -= 1;
}
if (objectX== 2425 && objectY== 3074 && absX == 2426 && absY == 3074)
{
	teleportToX = 2425;
	teleportToY = 3077;
	heightLevel -= 1;
}
if (objectX == 2425 && objectY == 3074 && absX == 2426 && absY == 3074) 
{
  	teleportToX = 2425;
 	 teleportToY = 3077;
 	 heightLevel -= 1;	
}
if (objectX == 2430 && objectY == 3081 && absX == 2430 && absY == 3080) 
{
 	 teleportToX = 2427;
 	 teleportToY = 3081;
 	 heightLevel -= 1;	
}
if (objectX == 2419 && objectY == 3080 && absX == 2420 && absY == 3080) 
{
 	 teleportToX = 2419;
 	 teleportToY = 3077;
 	 heightLevel -= 1;	
}[/code]
